source:
%%sql
CREATE VIEW IF NOT EXISTS odw_curated_db.vw_dim_HR_Gender AS 
SELECT DISTINCT 
    CASE GenderKey 
        WHEN 'Male' THEN 1 
        WHEN 'Female' THEN 2 
        ELSE NULL
    END AS dim_gender_key,
    CASE GenderKey 
        WHEN 'Male' THEN 'Male'
        WHEN 'Female' THEN 'Female'
        WHEN '' THEN 'Unknown'
        WHEN NULL THEN 'NULL'
        ELSE 'Unknown'
    END AS Gender
FROM odw_harmonised_db.hist_SAP_HR

%%sql
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS odw_curated_db.pbi_dim_HR_Gender
USING delta
AS
SELECT * FROM odw_curated_db.vw_dim_HR_Gender
